H0.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Sam Allardyce

H1.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. David Moyes

H2.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Tony Pulis

H3.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Dick Advocaat

A4.text: Allardyce left West Ham on 24 May 2015, the final day of the season, after his contract was not renewed.

A5.text: Allardyce was named the new Sunderland manager on 9 October 2015, replacing Dick Advocaat.

A6.text: veteran Dutchman Dick Advocaat was appointed, saving the club from relegation.
